des: "A nice change from chocolate fondue. Serve with strawberries, apples, pears, pound cake, or angel food cake for dipping."
ins: Stir cream, butter, brown sugar, white sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt together in a saucepan over medium-low heat; bring to a boil, stirring just once to combine. Transfer the fondue into a fondue pot to keep warm for serving.
